priceCards.title: 4 Hours
priceCards.description: You can rent a bike for 4 hours and enjoy your riding around the city.

priceCards.title: 1 Day
priceCards.description: Facer pertinax salutandi quo nec elit utinam fierent, virtute dosent a reprimique suscipiantur.

priceCards.title: 1 Week
priceCards.description: There is an option to rent a bike for 1 week and learn the all corners of the city.

priceCards.title: 1 Month
priceCards.description: We provide an opportunity to rent a bike for 1 month and be a real city resident.
